MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:19am in order to carry out safe repairs on broken overhead line equipment near the Shooting School substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:27am on 26th December
